name: Roller Stars
description:
Roller Stars is a 3D casual game where you need to manipulate the ball to destroy buildings and recycle materials.

Features:

control: Use the mouse to drag the ball

Game difficulty: The number of game levels is very rich, and the difficulty will continue to increase.

Beautiful environment

Great sounds

Great effects

Future developments :

- More characters
- More Voices
- More Powers
- More levels
- More fun
